name: fairway
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in golf, the area of short grass between the tee (= place where you first hit the ball) and the green (= place where the ball should enter a hole): He completely missed the fairway from his tee shot, and his ball ended up in the bushes.
ImagineGolf/E+/GettyImages
